notes.text: Used this to reach max Lvl in round 1 of the KC Cup, so I wanted to see if I could also get KoG with the deck. Def the best build I tried and is very consistent. Got me from plat 1 to kog within 40ish games. With all the Dino with back row decks and all the GBs this can wipe out the entire back row or wipe out swarm heavy decks like hazy. Hardest match up to face is REZ mainly because bacon saver can mess up the OTK or the surprise splashed in kuriboh.
